about_the_game:
Justice Strikes

JS is a third-person-shooter action game.
The player is a special agent in a city populated by two types of people: thugs and common people.
Several thugs form a gang. Each gang consists of a leader and gang members.
There are several gangs in the city that make problems. The goal is to seek them and defeat them.

Action mode

In the game, there are two types of missions:

1. Investigation
  • 1.1. Finding clues in a crime zone and discovering suspects.
  • 1.2. Investigating suspects (spying on them) to find out their hideouts, bases and connections between gang members (finding more suspects).
  • 1.3. Initiate action mission.
2. Action mission
  • 2.1. Joining an action mission (initiated from the player or generated from other agents -- computer or co-op players).
  • 2.2. Attacking gangs’ bases or hideouts.
  • 2.3. Pursuing (by foot or car) gang members to arrest or defeat them.
  • 2.3. Locating gang members in an area to spy on them or arrest them.
  • 2.4. Asking for help.
  • 2.5. Rescuing an agent.

Creative mode

3.Procedural City Generation.
4.Mission Creation. Create missions, export them and share with the community. Import and play missions from friends and community.
Create mission:
  • 4.1. Select number of people in the city.
  • 4.2. Select number of gangs.
  • 4.3. Select members of the gangs
  • 4.4. Select leader of the gang.
  • 4.5. Select gang's base and gang's hide outs .
